nif_0000_03208_2.name: Quantitative mRNA Expression Profile of Nuclear Receptor Superfamily in HepG2 and HeLa Cells
nif_0000_03208_2.description: In HepG2 and HeLa cells, we profiled mRNA expression of NR superfamily using TaqMan-based qRT-PCR assays
nif_0000_03208_2.contributors: Bookout AL, Jeong Y, Downes M, Yu RT, Evans RM and Mangelsdorf DJ
nif_0000_03208_2.reference: Bookout AL, Jeong Y, Downes M, Yu RT, Evans RM and Mangelsdorf DJ (2006) Anatomical profiling of nuclear receptor expression reveals a hierarchical transcriptional network. Cell 126 789-99
